pull_requests.title: [bip-0379]: standardize naming
pull_requests.body: i think that we should wait for approval from BIP's author that's why i created PR for every of BIP.

comment_list.body: BIPs may be submitted as Markdown files or as Mediawiki files. Renaming this file is simply incorrect.
If you look at the preview of the changed file, you will see that the rendering is borked.
